alert.note: Alert for Hinds; Rankin (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 21 at 6:15PM CDT until April 21 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Rankin County in central Mississippi... Southeastern Hinds County in central Mississippi... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 614 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Byram, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Jackson and Byram around 620 PM CDT. Richland around 635 PM CDT. Pearl around 640 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
